change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 12/2015, effective January 21, 2015.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Lazo Marsh-North East Comox Wildlife Management Area
bcl:section.bcl:text: The area of land under the administration of the Minister of Environment and outlined in red on the attached map is designated the Lazo Marsh-North East Comox Wildlife Management Area, the whole containing 127 hectares, more or less.

bcl:lefttext.in:em: The map referred to in the text is exempt from publication and may be inspected at the offices of the Wildlife Branch, Ministry of Environment, Victoria, B.C.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Wildlife Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 488, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 4]
